name: Shadow Realm (TrexandDrago Development)
description:
"Nobody is listening..."

"...Even my father..."

Published as an entry for RPG Jam 2023.

Theme: No Weapon

Anthony Fitzgerald was a 13-years-old who ha a been neglected by his father since his mother was dead when he was eight.

Everytimes his father has a problem, he always vent it to Anthony, even blames him as the one who caused the death of his mother.

This game contains reference of child neglection and father wound. You've been warned!
